testsuite.name: ColorControllerSpec

testcase.name: Get all colors from all users when visiting home aka color-index
Check that session is empty when visiting color index without being logged in
Get a user's created colors when viewing 'My Colors'
check that an attempt to see created colors without logged in user returns an error
Get a users favorite colors list given they are signed in
check that an attempt to see favorited colors without logged in user returns an error

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Get all colors from all users when visiting home aka color-index-- --Output from Check that session is empty when visiting color index without being logged in-- --Output from Get a user's created colors when viewing 'My Colors'-- --Output from check that an attempt to see created colors without logged in user returns an error-- --Output from Get a users favorite colors list given they are signed in-- --Output from check that an attempt to see favorited colors without logged in user returns an error--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Get all colors from all users when visiting home aka color-index-- --Output from Check that session is empty when visiting color index without being logged in-- --Output from Get a user's created colors when viewing 'My Colors'-- --Output from check that an attempt to see created colors without logged in user returns an error-- --Output from Get a users favorite colors list given they are signed in-- --Output from check that an attempt to see favorited colors without logged in user returns an error--

testsuite.name: LoginControllerSpec

testcase.name: A session user is defined when a user signs in
A session user is not defined when a user signs in with incorrect information
A session user is cleared when logging out

testsuite.system-out: --Output from A session user is defined when a user signs in-- --Output from A session user is not defined when a user signs in with incorrect information-- --Output from A session user is cleared when logging out--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from A session user is defined when a user signs in-- --Output from A session user is not defined when a user signs in with incorrect information-- --Output from A session user is cleared when logging out--

testsuite.name: UserControllerSpec

testcase.name: registering a user creates them within the database
registering a user with invalidated data returns an error
adding favorite colors to users will populate the user's FavoriteColors
adding favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error
removing favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error

testsuite.system-out: --Output from registering a user creates them within the database-- --Output from registering a user with invalidated data returns an error-- --Output from adding favorite colors to users will populate the user's FavoriteColors-- --Output from adding favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error-- --Output from removing favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from registering a user creates them within the database-- --Output from registering a user with invalidated data returns an error-- --Output from adding favorite colors to users will populate the user's FavoriteColors-- --Output from adding favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error-- --Output from removing favorite colors when no session user is set results in an error--
